response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of enhancing your business with this remarkable offering. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
